TDH Lighting

TDH is one of the leading Manufacturer, Wholealer and Trader of DMX Spliter, Electronic Dimmer, Dimmer Rack, Sharpy Light, LED Spotlight, Stage Light and Theater Profile Light. Our vendors employ the most modern machinery to carry out production and other related processes perfectly.
